text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child, his name was called JESUS…
And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us… full of grace and truth.
…there came wise men from the east… Where is he that is born King of the Jews? for we have seen his star…
Trust in the LORD with all thine heart… and he shall direct thy paths.
Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
…they saw the young child with Mary his mother, and fell down, and worshipped him…
I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
Behold the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.
…the heavens were opened… This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way.
The Spirit of the Lord is upon me… to preach the gospel to the poor…
Wait on the LORD: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart…
Repent: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
The time is fulfilled… repent ye, and believe the gospel.
Trust in him at all times… God is a refuge for us.
We have found the Messias, which is… the Christ.
Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel, and afterward receive me to glory.
Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men.
Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
Fear not; from henceforth thou shalt catch men.
They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion…
…thou, LORD, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
Some trust in chariots… but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man.
Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid…
The LORD God is my strength, and he will make my feet like hinds' feet…
The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee…
…the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing…
I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills… My help cometh from the LORD…
Lord, now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace… mine eyes have seen thy salvation.
Be strong and of a good courage… for the LORD thy God is with thee…
He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness…
Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths. Lead me in thy truth…
Cause me to know the way wherein I should walk…
…he will be our guide even unto death.
And [Jesus] was transfigured before them: and his face did shine as the sun…
For thou art my rock… lead me, and guide me.
…lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
And he led them forth by the right way…
…the joy of the LORD is your strength.
Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy…
A man's heart deviseth his way: but the LORD directeth his steps.
Delight thyself also in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness.
Be still, and know that I am God…
For my thoughts are not your thoughts, neither are your ways my ways…
And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God…
…set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.
…turn ye even to me with all your heart, and with fasting…
Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.
Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.
Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.
Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.
Order my steps in thy word…
But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness…
…he is their strength in the time of trouble.
The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart…
…whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst…
For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son…
And call upon me in the day of trouble: I will deliver thee…
In the multitude of my thoughts within me thy comforts delight my soul.
I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep…
And the work of righteousness shall be peace…
…let the peace of God rule in your hearts…
Great peace have they which love thy law…
Depart from evil… seek peace, and pursue it.
…the end of that man is peace.
LORD, thou wilt ordain peace for us…
…he will speak peace unto his people…
He maketh peace in thy borders…
…his name shall be called… The Prince of Peace.
The LORD is my rock… in whom I will trust…
The LORD is my strength and my shield…
But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength…
God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
Fear thou not… I will strengthen thee…
I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
The LORD will give strength unto his people…
…the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.
The LORD is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.
Trust ye in the LORD for ever: for in the LORD JEHOVAH is everlasting strength.
…thou shalt conceive… and bring forth a son, and shalt call his name JESUS…
The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge.
My soul, wait thou only upon God…
Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee…
O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation…
He giveth power to the faint…
The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in…
Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil…
Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.
…I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.
Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him…
The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him…
As for God, his way is perfect…
All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth…
I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live…
Hosanna to the Son of David: Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord…
Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David…
Father, if thou be willing, remove this cup from me: nevertheless not my will, but thine, be done.
When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar, he said, It is finished: and he bowed his head, and gave up the ghost.
He is not here: for he is risen, as he said. Come, see the place where the Lord lay.
Why seek ye the living among the dead? He is not here, but is risen…
Peace be unto you. And when he had so said, he shewed unto them his hands and his side…
This is the day which the LORD hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
…hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead…
…in thy presence is fulness of joy…
Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you…
…weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
…that like as Christ was raised up from the dead… even so we also should walk in newness of life.
The LORD is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.
But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength…
God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
The LORD is my strength and my shield…
Fear thou not… I will strengthen thee…
The LORD will give strength unto his people…
…the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.
The LORD is my strength and song…
Trust ye in the LORD for ever…
They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion…
…thou, LORD, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
Some trust in chariots… but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man.
What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
Trust in him at all times…
He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD.
…whoso putteth his trust in the LORD shall be safe.
I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge and my fortress…
The LORD is my rock… in whom I will trust…
Trust in the LORD, and do good…
Trust in him at all times…
Trust ye in the LORD for ever…
They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion…
…thou, LORD, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.

Trust in him at all times…
He shall not be afraid of evil tidings…
…whoso putteth his trust in the LORD shall be safe.
I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge…
The LORD is my rock… in whom I will trust…
The people that walked in darkness have seen a great light…
Trust in him at all times…
And there shall come forth a rod out of the stem of Jesse…
…thou shalt conceive in thy womb, and bring forth a son…
…thou, LORD, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
…the ransomed of the LORD shall return… with songs and everlasting joy…
My soul doth magnify the Lord, And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.
What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
Behold, a virgin shall conceive, and bear a son, and shall call his name Immanuel.
I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge…
Behold, a virgin shall be with child… and they shall call his name Emmanuel…
The LORD is my rock… in whom I will trust…
The Spirit of the Lord GOD is upon me; because the LORD hath anointed me…
Trust in him at all times…
My soul doth magnify the Lord…
Trust ye in the LORD for ever…
For unto us a child is born… The Prince of Peace.
…thou, LORD, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
…I bring you good tidings of great joy… For unto you is born this day… a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord.
What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
Behold, a virgin shall conceive… Immanuel.
He shall not be afraid of evil tidings…
I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge…
Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.
And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us…
The LORD is my rock… in whom I will trust…
Trust in the LORD, and do good…
Trust in him at all times…
Trust ye in the LORD for ever…
They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion…
Commit thy way unto the LORD; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
